entity.name: Data
entity.description: Generic structure for describing data matrices such as genotype result, gene expression measurement, QTL calculation, etc.

field.name: Investigation
field.description: Reference to the Investigation this data is measured as part of.

field.name: RowType
field.description: Type of the columns of this matrix. Each column refers to a Trait or Subject (DimensionElement).

field.name: ColType
field.description: Type of the rows of this matrix. Each row refers to a Trait or Subject (DimensionElement)

field.name: ValueType
field.description: Type of the values of this matrix. E.g. text strings or decimal numbers.

entity.name: DimensionElement
entity.description:
Describes the biological material or subject which is being 'measured' by an Data set.
For example an 'Sample' extends from Item, which makes it possible that a microarray-assay Data set such sample (as DataElement can reference any Item).
An DimensionElement is always linked to a single one Investigation.

field.name: Investigation
field.description: Reference to the investigation this belongs to.

unique.description: Name is unique within an investigation within its type (e.g. there can be a Gene and a Protein with the same name, but not another Gene).

entity.name: DataElement
entity.description: Generic data structure for aiming the values of a data set as described in Data. Each DataElement describes a cell in a data matrix of rows (from) and columns (to), e.g., in "dataset X" it was measured that geneX (col) relates to geneZ (row).

field.name: id
field.description: automatically generated id-field

field.name: Data
field.description: Reference to the data this entity belongs to.

field.name: Col
field.description: References the DimensionElement on one end of the relation. Can be ommited for 1D data (i.e., a data list)

field.name: Row
field.description: References the DimensionElement on the other end of the relation.

field.name: RowIndex
field.description: Row position in the matrix.

field.name: ColIndex
field.description: Col position in the matrix.

entity.name: DecimalDataElement
entity.description: A DataElement for storing decimal data.

field.name: Value
field.label: Value
field.description: The value, e.g., correlation.

entity.name: TextDataElement
entity.description: Store text data

field.name: Value
field.label: Value
field.description: The value, e.g., genotype strings like AA, BA, BB.

entity.name: Tissue

field.name: Species
